concept.title: Lock Handler Plugin Extension
concept.shortdesc: This type of plugin extension is used for locking resources from a specific protocol.

dlentry.dd:
You need to implement the following two methods:
LockHandler getLockHandler() Gets the lock handler for the current handled protocol. Might be null if not supported.
boolean isLockingSupported(String protocol) Checks if a lock handler can be provided for a specific protocol.
To use this type of extension in your plugin, create an extension of LockHandlerFactory type in your plugin.xml file and specify the class implementing LockHandlerFactoryPluginExtension:<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE plugin SYSTEM "../plugin.dtd"> <plugin name="CustomLockHandler" ..............> <runtime> ........ </runtime>
<extension type="LockHandlerFactory" class="LockHandlerFactoryPluginExtensionImpl"/> ...............
</plugin>
